info.name: NEA (DATA.GOV.SG)
info.description:
# Collection of NEA API

PM2.5
- Regional hourly PM2.5 value measured in Î¼g/m3

Pollutant Standards Index (PSI)
- Overall and regional PSI data (24-hr PSI, Pollutant Concentration and Sub-Index)

Ultra-violet Index (UVI)
- UV Index value averaged over the past hour. Updated every hour between 7 AM and 7 PM everyday.

2-hour Weather Forecast
- Weather forecast for next 2 hours

24-hour Weather Forecast
- Weather forecast for next 24 hours

4-day Weather Forecast
- Weather forecast for next 4 days

Air Temperature across Singapore
- Minute-by-minute air temperature readings at weather-station level.

Rainfall across Singapore
- Precipitation readings at weather-station level, updated every five minutes.

Relative Humidity across Singapore
- Minute-by-minute relative humidity readings at weather-station level.

Wind Direction across Singapore
- Minute-by-minute wind direction readings at weather-station level.

Wind Speed across Singapore
- Minute-by-minute wind speed readings at weather-station level.

request.description:
Updated hourly from NEA.
- Readings are provided for each major region in Singapore
- The region_metadata field in the response provides longitude/latitude information for the regions. You can use that to place the readings on a map.
- Use the date_time parameter to retrieve the latest PM2.5 readings at that moment in time
- Use the date parameter to retrieve all of the readings for that day

Updated hourly from NEA.
- Readings are provided for each major region in Singapore
- The region_metadata field in the response provides longitude/latitude information for the regions. You can use that to place the readings on a map.
- Use the date_time parameter to retrieve the latest PSI readings at that moment in time.
- Use the date parameter to retrieve all of the readings for that day.

UV Index value averaged over the past hour. Updated every hour between 7 AM and 7 PM everyday.
- Updated every hour between 7 AM and 7 PM everyday
- The UV index value is averaged over the preceeding hour
- Use the date_time parameter to retrieve the latest forecast issued at that moment in time.
- Use the date parameter to retrieve all of the forecasts issued for that day

Weather forecast for next 2 hours
- Updated half-hourly from NEA
- Forecasts are given for multiple areas in Singapore
- The area_metadata field in the response provides longitude/latitude information for the areas. You can use that to place the forecasts on a map.
- Use the date_time parameter to retrieve the latest forecast issued at that moment in time.
- Use the date parameter to retrieve all of the forecasts issued for that day

Weather forecast for next 24 hours
- Updated multiple times throughout the day
A general forecast for the 24 hour period is provided
- Forecasts for each major region in Singapore is also provided for 6/12 hour periods
- Use the date_time parameter to retrieve the latest forecast issued at that moment in time.
- Use the date parameter to retrieve all of the forecasts issued for that day

Weather forecast for next 4 days
- Updated twice a day from NEA
- The forecast is for the next 4 days
- Use the date_time parameter to retrieve the latest forecast issued at that moment in time.
- Use the date parameter to retrieve all of the forecasts issued for that day

Minute-by-minute air temperature readings at weather-station level.
- Has per-minute readings from NEA
- Use the date_time parameter to retrieve the latest available data at that moment in time
- Use the date parameter to retrieve all of the readings for that day.

Precipitation readings at weather-station level, updated every five minutes.
- 5-minute readings from NEA
- Use the date_time parameter to retrieve the latest available data at that moment in time
- Use the date parameter to retrieve all of the readings for that day.

Minute-by-minute relative humidity readings at weather-station level.
- Has per-minute readings from NEA
- Use the date_time parameter to retrieve the latest available data at that moment in time
- Use the date parameter to retrieve all of the readings for that day.

Minute-by-minute wind direction readings at weather-station level.
- Has per-minute readings from NEA
- Use the date_time parameter to retrieve the latest available data at that moment in time
- Use the date parameter to retrieve all of the readings for that day.

Minute-by-minute wind speed readings at weather-station level.
- Has per-minute readings from NEA
- Use the date_time parameter to retrieve the latest available data at that moment in time
- Use the date parameter to retrieve all of the readings for that day.
